nodes.text: Pyrshak was the primary star of the Pyrshak system, located in the Inner Rim of the galaxy. It was orbited by three planets: the molten world Pyr, the water world Manaan, and the gas giant Navlaas.

Pyrshak first appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, and was first named in the 2004 Wizards of the Coast article Manaan: Depths of History. The Pyrshak system was originally placed in the Mid Rim, but later sources shifted it to the Inner Rim.
